name: brain
description: an interface to my elephant brain

scripts.predeploy: sed -i '' "s%image: .*%image: $(npm run --silent tag)%g" deployment.yml && git add deployment.yml
scripts.push: git push && git push --tags && docker push $(npm run --silent tag)
scripts.version: npm run build && npm run predeploy
scripts.postversion: npm run push && npm run deploy
